title: ✿ BEAUTIFUL, LARGE Lincoln Square studio - W/D IN UNIT - central air
posting_body: ['SEE VIDEO (copy and paste the YouTube link into your browser):  <URL>', '2203 W. Eastwood, 1st floor', 'Gorgeous, large studio apartment for rent in the Ravenswood / Lincoln Square area!', ' This is a high 1st floor unit in a walk-up building at Eastwood and Leavitt.', ' Only 2.5 blocks from both the Damen and the Western brown line stations.', 'Available now!', 'Hardwood floors', 'Granite / stainless steel kitchen', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Large living room will fit both living room and bedroom furniture', 'Laundry IN UNIT', 'Central air and gas heat (paid by tenant)', 'Tenants pay for gas, electric, and a $40/month utility fee for water/trash/sewer', 'Street parking only', 'Pets ~40 pounds or less are welcome (two pets max) - dogs with a $500 pet fee and cats a $295 pet fee', 'Living room/kitchen 18\'4" x 13\'6"', 'Bathroom 7\'1" x 4\'11"', '$395 non-refundable move-in fee per apartment (no security deposit)', '$75 application/credit check fee per adult applicant', 'To see, call or email', 'Heidi Sonnenberg', 'The Square One Team', 'Applications are taken on a first come, first serve basis.', 'To rent this apartment, the following are due up front:', "1)  First month's rent", '2)  Application fee(s)', '3)  Move-in fee and pet fee(s)']
